column5: Going to be fishing in the Harris Lake / Magnetawan River area. Any reports? Any suggestions on baits and colors?
Its always nice to see an intro first, then maybe ask around. You wont get too many hits with your first post asking for "suggestions"  I dont fish either of them so I cant help
i know the area well, what are u fishing for?
Some big muskies in the Magnetewan around Britt

We'll be fishing for smallmouth/largemouth bass, walleye and pike, mainly on the wide part of the Magnetawan. What is most plentiful? What would you suggest chasing? This will be a first time for us.  Thinking of fishing White's Lake and Trout lake, also. What do you know about them?
